metadata.Title: CVE-2023-1195 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A use-after-free flaw was found in reconn_set_ipaddr_from_hostname infs/cifs/connect.c in the Linux kernel. The issue occurs when it forgets toset the free pointer server->hostname to NULL, leading to an invalidpointer request.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
